00005 static int getOffset(int x,  int y, int z,
00006                                  int tx, int ty)
00007 {
00008         return x + y*tx + z*tx*ty;

00024 template <class T> 
00025 Image<T>::Image(const TSize *size)
00026 {
00027         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00028         {
00029                 this->size[i] = size[i];
00030         }
00031         
00032         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00033         {
00034                 this->spacing[i] = 1.0;
00035         }
00036         
00037         this->dataSize=this->size[0]*this->size[1]*this->size[2];
00038         try {
00039                 this->data = new T [this->dataSize];
00040                 }
00041         catch (std::exception &e)
00042                 {
00043                 std::cerr << "Image<T>::Image(const TSize *size) : could not allocate buffer : " << e.what() << std::endl;
00044         exit(-1);
00045                 }
00046 }

00054         this->size[1] = ySize;
00055         this->size[2] = zSize;
00056         
00057         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00058         {
00059                 this->spacing[i] = 1.0;
00060         }
00061         
00062         this->dataSize=this->size[0]*this->size[1]*this->size[2];
00063         try {
00064                 this->data = new T [this->dataSize];

00075 template <class T>
00076 Image<T>::Image(const TSize *size, const TSpacing *spacing, const T *data)
00077 {
00078         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) this->size[i] = size[i];
00079         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) this->spacing[i] = spacing[i];
00080         this->dataSize=this->size[0]*this->size[1]*this->size[2];
00081         
00082         try {
00083                 this->data=new T [this->dataSize];
00084                 }
00085         catch(std::exception & e)
00086                 {
00087         std::cerr << "Image<T>::Image(const TSize *size, const TSpacing *spacing, const T *data) : could not allocate buffer : " << e.what() << std::endl;
00088         exit(-1);
00089                 }
00090         
00091         for(int i=0; i<this->dataSize; i++) this->data[i]=data[i];
00092 }

00115 //Assignment operator
00116 template <class T>
00117 Image <T> & Image<T>::operator=(const Image <T> &im)
00118 {
00119         if(this != &im)
00120                 {
00121                 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) this->size[i] = im.size[i];
00122                 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) this->spacing[i] = im.spacing[i];
00123                 if(this->data != 0)
00124                         {
00125                         delete this->data;
00126                         }
00127                 this->dataSize=im.size[0]*im.size[1]*im.size[2];
00128                 try {
00129                         this->data=new T [this->dataSize];
00130                         }
00131                 catch(std::exception & e)
00132                         {
00133                 std::cerr << "Image <T> & Image<T>::operator=(const Image <T> &im) : could not allocate buffer : " << e.what() << std::endl;
00134                 exit(-1);
00135                         }
00136 
00137                 for (int i=0; i<this->dataSize; i++)
00138                         this->data[i] = im.data[i];
00139                 }
00140         return *this;
00141 }

00146 template<class T>
00147 template <class T2>
00148 Image<T>::Image( const Image<T2> &im)
00149 {
00150         this->size[0]=im.getSizeX();
00151         this->size[1]=im.getSizeY();
00152         this->size[2]=im.getSizeZ();
00153         
00154         this->spacing[0]=im.getSpacingX();
00155         this->spacing[1]=im.getSpacingY();
00156         this->spacing[2]=im.getSpacingZ();
00157         
00158         this->dataSize=this->size[0]*this->size[1]*this->size[2];
00159         try {
00160                 this->data=new T [this->dataSize];
00161                 }
00162         catch(std::exception & e)
00163                 {
00164         std::cerr << "Image<T>::Image( Image<T2> &im): could not allocate buffer : " << e.what() << std::endl;
00165         exit(-1);
00166                 }
00167         
00168         for (int i=0; i < this->dataSize; i++)
00169                 this->data[i] = static_cast<T> (im(i));
00170 }

00200 {

00202                 this->data[i]=std::min(this->data[i],op(i));

00206 template <class T>
00207 Image <T> &Image<T>::operator|=(Image <T> &op)
00208 {
00209         for(int i=0; i<dataSize; i++)
00210                 this->data[i]=std::max(this->data[i],op(i));
00211         return *this;

00214 template <class T>
00215 Image <T> &Image<T>::operator!()
00216 {
00217         T max=std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
00218         T min=std::numeric_limits<T>::min();
00219         
00220         for(int i=0; i<this->dataSize; i++)
00221                 this->data[i]=max+min-this->data[i];
00222         return *this;
00223 }

00226 template <class T>
00227 T Image<T>::getMax(void) const
00228 { 
00229 T max=std::numeric_limits<T>::min(); 
00230 for (int i=0;i<dataSize; i++) 
00231         if(this->data[i]>max) 
00232                 max=this->data[i]; 
00233 return max;
00234 }

00236 template <class T>
00237 T Image<T>::getMin(void) const
00238 { 
00239 T min=std::numeric_limits<T>::max(); 
00240 for (int i=0;i<this->dataSize; i++) 
00241         if(this->data[i]<min) 
00242                 min=this->data[i]; 
00243 return min;
00244 }

00248 template <class T> 
00249 void Image<T>::fill(const T value)
00250 {
00251         for(int i=0; i<this->dataSize; i++)
00252                 this->data[i]=value;
00253 }

00256 template <class T> 
00257 Image<T>  Image<T>::crop(const TCoord fromX, const TCoord toX, 
00258                                         const TCoord fromY, const TCoord toY, 
00259                                         const TCoord fromZ, const TCoord toZ)
00260 {
00261         TCoord dx=toX-fromX;
00262         TCoord dy=toY-fromY;
00263         TCoord dz=toZ-fromZ;
00264         assert(dx>=0 && dy>=0 && dz>=0);
00265         
00266         Image <T> res(dx,dy,dz);
00267         T min=std::numeric_limits<T>::min();
00268         res.fill(min);
00269         for(TCoord z=fromZ; z<toZ; z++)
00270                 for(TCoord y=fromY; y<toY; y++)
00271                         for(TCoord x=fromX; x<toX; x++)
00272                                 {
00273                                 if(this->isPosValid(x,y,z) )
00274                                         res(x-fromX,y-fromY,z-fromZ)=(*this)(x,y,z);
00275                                 }
00276         return res;
00277 }

00305 template <class VoxelType> 
00306 void Image<VoxelType>::copy(Image<VoxelType> &im,
00307                                          int x1, int y1, int z1,
00308                                      int x2, int y2, int z2,
00309                                          int px, int py, int pz)
00310 {
00311         /*
00312         assert( im.isPosValid(x1,y1,z1) );
00313         assert( im.isPosValid(x2,y2,z2) );
00314 
00315         assert( isPosValid(px + x2 - x1,
00316                                py + y2 - y1,
00317                                pz + z2 - z1) );
00318 */
00319         for (int x = 0; x <= x2-x1; x++)
00320         {
00321                 for (int y = 0; y <= y2-y1; y++)
00322                 {
00323                         for (int z = 0; z <= z2-z1; z++)
00324                         {                               
00325                                 this->operator()(px + x, py + y, pz + z)=im(x + x1, y + y1, z + z1);
00326                         }
00327                 }
00328         }
00329 }

00331 template <class VoxelType> 
00332 void Image<VoxelType>::copyFast(Image<VoxelType> &im,
00333                                          int x1, int y1, int z1,
00334                                      int x2, int y2, int z2,
00335                                          int px, int py, int pz)
00336 {
00337         /*
00338         assert( im.isPosValid(x1,y1,z1) );
00339         assert( im.isPosValid(x2,y2,z2) );
00340 
00341         assert( isPosValid(px + x2 - x1,
00342                                py + y2 - y1,
00343                                pz + z2 - z1) );
00344 */
00345         typename Image<VoxelType>::iteratorXYZ it;
00346         typename Image<VoxelType>::iteratorXYZ end=this->end();
00347         for (it=this->begin(); it!=end; ++it)
00348                 this->operator()(px + it.x, py + it.y, pz + it.z)=im(it.x + x1, it.y + y1, it.z + z1);
00349 }

00351 template <class VoxelType> 
00352 void Image<VoxelType>::copyFast(Image<VoxelType> &im,
00353                                          TCoord px, TCoord py, TCoord pz)
00354 {
00355         TSize *taille = im.getSize();
00356         copyFast(im, 0,0,0, taille[0]-1,taille[1]-1,taille[2]-1, px,py,pz);
00357 }

00368 template <class VoxelType> 
00369 Image<VoxelType> Image<VoxelType>::getReflection()
00370 {
00371         Image<VoxelType> im(*this);
00372 
00373         int *taille = getSize();
00374 
00375         for (int x = 0; x < taille[0]; x++)
00376         {
00377                 for (int y = 0; y < taille[1]; y++)
00378                 {
00379                         for (int z = 0; z < taille[2]; z++)
00380                         {
00381                                 im(x,y,z)=im(taille[0]-x-1,taille[1]-y-1,taille[2]-z-1);
00382                         }
00383                 }
00384         }
00385 
00386         return im;
00387 }

00389 template <class VoxelType> 
00390 bool Image<VoxelType>::isPosValid(TCoord x, TCoord y, TCoord z) const 
00391 {
00392         return (
00393                         (x >= 0) && (x < size[0]) &&
00394                         (y >= 0) && (y < size[1]) &&
00395                         (z >= 0) && (z < size[2])
00396                    );
00397 }
